title: Mark Holmes
description: I am a Minneapolis Software Engineer specializing in the web. Though I have worked mostly with Javascript, I consider myself a polyglot and have worked in, and am interested other programming languages. I am particularly interested in peer-to-peer interactions through WebRTC, blockchain distributed applications, and other technologies. Outside of my profession, I enjoy music, video games, skiing, and football.

headerPicture.pictureText: A picture of a Strapping Young Lad that you would want to work with or crack open a cold one with.
